name: Food Chain V2
description:
This project was created at home using the Unity development platform and C# coding environment for my school's Senior May Project. The art is all original with some inspiration from online sources and was one of the many things I needed to do to complete this project. This is a good project for students interested in coding and video games and is open to many different creative interpretations. A 2D platformer is just one of the many possibilities that Unity and other video game development platforms have to offer. 

Controls: AD for movement, Space for jump, J and K to attack
